mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, nickname, gender, birthday, social_id, social_type, active_status, inactive_time, user_mileage, is_member, created_at, updated_at, CONCAT(social_type, ' ', social_id) as username, 'user@example.com' as email, 'ROLE_USER' as role FROM users WHERE CONCAT(social_type, ' ', social_id) = #{username}

SELECT user_id, user_name, nickname, gender, birthday, social_id, social_type, active_status, inactive_time, user_mileage, is_member, created_at, updated_at, CONCAT(social_type, ' ', social_id) as username, 'user@example.com' as email, 'ROLE_USER' as role FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( user_name, nickname, gender, birthday, social_id, social_type, active_status, inactive_time, user_mileage, is_member, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{socialId}, #{socialType}, #{activeStatus}, #{inactiveTime}, #{userMileage}, #{isMember}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET user_name = #{userName}, nickname = #{nickname}, gender = #{gender}, birthday = #{birthday}, social_id = #{socialId}, social_type = #{socialType}, active_status = #{activeStatus}, inactive_time = #{inactiveTime}, user_mileage = #{userMileage}, is_member = #{isMember}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
